original_text: So the king left home. He took all his servants and family with him. But he left ten of his slave wives to take care of the palace.
korean_text: 왕이 나갈 때에 그의 가족을 다 따르게 하고 후궁 열 명을 왕이 남겨 두어 왕궁을 지키게 하니라

sentences.original_text: He took all his servants with him.
He took all his family with him.
But he left ten of his slave wives
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그의 첩 열 명을 남겨두었습니다

sentences.original_text: to take care of the palace.
